title: Vue3 + family bucket
content: The project is developed based on the latest vue3 family bucket, fully using the latest RFC script setupSyntax standards, bring you a different vue3 development experience

title: Element-Plus
content: Element Plus, a set for developers, designers and product managers The desktop component library based on Vue 3.0. Is the official vue 3 compatible version of Element UI

title: vue-element-admin
content:
vue-element-admin is a backend Front-end solution, it is based on vue and element-ui implementation, and 70K star< /a>.
This project uses the latest vue technology to reconstruct it, and expand its existing functions, and is committed to bringing you a front-end technology solution that is more in line with modern back-end development

title: ESLint + Git Hooks
content:
ESLint corresponds to the coding standard, and Git Hooks corresponds to the Git standard.
If you want to develop a large-scale enterprise-level project, you need to start with the specifications!

title: Architecture design
content: Ali front-end P7 post is called 'technical expert', and some people like to call them 'front-end architect'. Since they are called 'architect', architecture design is of course an indispensable part.

title: Authority verification (page authority, function authority, dynamic authority, authority configuration)
content: A comprehensive background authority verification system, which implements a full range of authority functions such as page authority, function authority, dynamic authority, authority configuration, etc.

title: Function guide
content: Function guidance to users

title: Configurable + shrink sidebar
content: Realize the real configuration Menu according to the Menu menu dynamically generated by the routing

title: Dynamic breadcrumbs
content: Dynamically generated breadcrumb data

title: Tags View
content: Notes quick navigation function

title: svg sprite icon
content: Customized svg Icon is automatically assigned and imported with el Icon

title: Internationalization
content: Multi-language internationalization function realization

title: Dynamic skinning
content: Theme replacement function, provide cache implementation

title: Page search
content: Search data based on the page automatically generated by the routing configuration, without manual configuration

title: excel export, import
content: Import and export of excel tables

title: zip import
content: Export page data as zip

title: Rich text + MarkDown editor
content: Commonly used editor functions, including rich text editor && MarkDown editor

title: Dynamic table + drag and drop table + inline editing table
content: Common operations of table lists are mostly used in display functions that contain table items. Including: dynamic table && drag and drop table && inline editing table

title: Unified error handling
content: The page-level error handling is handled uniformly by vue-router. Including 401 and 404 error handling

title: release
content: Build and release

title: other
content: In addition to the above functions, we have also implemented many other functions, such as: CDN, dynamic environment variable configuration, lazy loading, cross-domain, etc.
